title: India has potential to export electric two-wheelers: Nitin Gadkari
description: India has the potential to become a major export hub for electric two-wheelers, according to Transport & Highways Minister Nitin Gadkari. He highlighted that companies like Bajaj and TVS are already exporting nearly 50% of their production. With battery prices decreasing, electric vehicles are expected to be cost-competitive with petrol and diesel vehicles within two years, driving up demand.
